attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned petition Alistair Darling,the Chancellor of the Exchequer,as our representative of UK tax payers of UK Financial Investments (UKFI)on the RBS board,that he exercise's our shareholders veto and stop all bonuses that RBS plans to pay to it's to employees.Time is running out, so the Chancellor of the Exchequer needs to act quickly.
